testcase.name: Get deleted user payment details by Id of REST APIs
testcase.system-out: * call read('classpath:reusable.feature') ................................. passed * call read('classpath:com/sample/rest/apis/GetAllPaymentDetails.feature') . passed * call read('classpath:com/sample/rest/apis/CreateNewUserPayment.feature') . passed * call read('classpath:com/sample/rest/apis/GetCreatedUserPaymentById.feature') . passed * call read('classpath:com/sample/rest/apis/ModifyCreatedUserPayment.feature') . passed * call read('classpath:com/sample/rest/apis/PatchCreatedUserPayment.feature') . passed * call read('classpath:com/sample/rest/apis/DeleteCreatedUserPayment.feature') . passed Given url 'https://sample-4e6d.restdb.io/rest/payments/'+id ............... passed And header x-apikey = '9677194df0cd556c1bb2f9aeee86c7e218482' ............. passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print 'response : '+response ............................................ passed
